app.name: Trapp Door
app.description: It’s not about IDEAS. It’s about making them happen.
rules: Number of participants: 1
Participant should have the basic knowledge of Mobile App development, Server side web Technologies and Cryptography.
Participant must have a Laptop, Data cable and smartphone with an active Internet connection.
Participants cannot participate in any other event.

code.name: Bitmorphose
code.description: Code doesn't solve problems. They execute solutions.
rules: Number of participants: 1
Participants must be familiar with C, C++
Mobile phones aren’t allowed during the rounds.
Participants cannot participate in any other event.

digiarts.name: Bitsplash
digiarts.description: Make it better than you found it.
rules: Number of participants: 1
Participants should get their laptops, Digital camera and smart phones.
Laptop must be loaded with required softwares (Image and Video Editing).
To participate, each participant must create a travel vlog.
Participants cannot participate in any other event.

gaming.name: Aimbits
rules: Number of participants: 1
Participant can bring their headphones and mouse for better experience.

thunt.name: Cipher Chase
thunt.description: The path you fear to travel, holds the treasure you seek.
rules: Number of participants: 2
Participants cannot participate in any other event.
Participants must have a smart phone with an active internet connection.

itman.name: Techarch
itman.description: If you can’t handle stress, then you won’t manage success.
rules: Number of participants: 1.
Participant cannot participate in any other event.
Participant must have a laptop with internet connection and a pendrive.
Participant must come in a formal attire.

mevent.name: Alpha Duo
mevent.description: If you fall behind, you end behind.
rules: Number of participants: 2
Participant cannot participate in any other event.
Participants must possess Android phone with active internet connectivity.
At least one participant must have the laptop.
Participants must have basic technical knowledge.

variety.name: X Factor
variety.description: A really great talent finds it's happiness in execution.
rules: Teams can perform any form of art (skit, singing, dance, Stand-Up comedy, etc.)
The theme will be given 5 days prior
The group must consist of at least 4 students on the stage, Maximum of 8+4 minutes will be allotted to each team.
Costumes and Quality of the performance will be considered for the judgement.
Vulgarity in performance will not be entertained.
No solo performances are allowed.

itquiz.name: Enigma
itquiz.description: It’s all about your Gray Matter!!!
rules: Number of participants: 2
Decision of Quiz Master will be final.
Usage of electronic gadgets during the rounds is strictly prohibited.

rdbms.name: CryptoJack
rules: Number of participants: 1
Participant must have the knowledge of PL/SQL and SQL.
Participant must know to work with Oracle.

webdev.name: Dark Web
rules: Number of participants: 1
Participant must be familiar with HTML/HTML5, CSS, CSS3, JavaScript and jQuery.
Theme will be announced on spot.
